top_issues.issue: Consider adding multimedia content for engagement
Add structured data like Schema.org markup
Add hreflang tags if targeting multiple languages/regions
Title may be truncated in search results, consider shortening
Reduce page size to improve load speed
Add descriptive anchor text to internal links
Canonical URL does not match page URL
Aim for keyword density between 1.5-2.5% for primary keywords
Include main keywords in the H1 heading
